title: Brought Down From Inside (19P24)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmish you may transfer this condition to a [Rohan] Man. At the end of each turn, if bearer did not win a skirmish this turn, return this condition to hand.
Rarity:	P
